Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #an Ice Trap#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Red Rupee# and #an Ice Trap#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #an Ice Trap# and #an Ice Trap#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Recovery Heart 1
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Forest Trial)

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #stable#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Silver Rupee 4

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Spirit Temple#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Spirit Temple Adult Boulders)

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Push Block Room Red Rupee 1

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Skull Mask#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #3# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Spirit Temple#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Spirit Temple Adult Boulders)

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Barinade#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #an Ice Trap#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Water Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that you only need to play the Song of Time to open the Door of Time? The Spiritual Stones are not needed.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Spikes Silver Rupee Ceiling Middle

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #an Ice Trap#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Blue Potion Bottle#.
